member.name: M:InheritDocLib.InheritDocUtil.Run(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Action{InheritDocLib.LogLevel,System.String})
member.summary: Call to post process XML documentation files to replace <inheritdoc/> tags in XML comments (see https://www.inheritdoc.io)
member.param: Leave blank to use current directory. Will scan for any project files under base path, determine assemblies from project files, and determine XML documentation files from project assemblies.

Set to a comma delimited list of XML documentation file names to process (may use wild cards like 'Butterfly.*', leave blank to scan for assemblies in project files, do not include paths). Example: 'Butterfly.Database.xml,Butterfly.Channel.*'
Set to false to create new .new.xml files. Set to true to replace the existing .xml files.
Set to optional callback to receive log messages.
member.returns: List of XML documentation files modified (relative to base path).
